cards.name: Spiral Serpent
cards.description: "When huge whirlpools lay cities asunder, it is the hunger of this sea serpent at work. No one has ever escaped its dreaded Spiral Wave to accurately describe the terror they experienced."

cards.name: The Tricky
cards.description: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by discarding 1 card.

cards.name: The Calculator
cards.description: The ATK of this card is the combined Levels of all face-up monsters you control x 300.

cards.name: Bitron
cards.description: A new species found in electronic space. There's not much information on it.
